text.page:
226
096-113b @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te/ phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma re re phyag gsum gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo many+dzu shri ye/ na maHsu shri ye/ na ma ut+ta ma shri ye swA hA/ phyag bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
